insert into mz_user (code, createTime, deleted, duty, email, `name`, nickName, `password`, sex, `state`, userName, phoneno, `type`, errorCount) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorcount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mz_user set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duty = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneno = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, errorCount = #{errorcount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, code, createTime, deleted, duty, email, `name`, nickName, `password`, sex, `state`, userName, phoneno, `type`, errorCount from mz_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
